1.brief: happiness; only in masculine plural construction as interjection, how happy!
to be (causatively, make or act) circumspect and hence, intelligent
near, with or among; often in general, to
properly, dangling, i.e. (by implication) weak or thin
a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
bad or (as noun) evil (natural or moral)
properly, to be smooth, i.e. (by implication) to escape (as if by slipperiness); causatively, to release or rescue; specifically, to bring forth young, emit sparks
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God

2.brief: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
properly, to hedge about (as with thorns), i.e. guard; generally, to protect, attend to, etc.
to live, whether literally or figuratively; causatively, to revive
to be straight (used in the widest sense, especially to be level, right, happy); figuratively, to go forward, be honest, proper
the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
not (the qualified negation, used as a deprecative); once (Job 24:25) as a noun, nothing
to give, used with greatest latitude of application (put, make, etc.)
properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)

3.brief: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
a bed (figuratively, a bier); abstractly, sleep; by euphemism, carnal intercourse
to turn about or over; by implication, to change, overturn, return, pervert

4.brief: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
properly, to bend or stoop in kindness to an inferior; to favor, bestow; causatively to implore (i.e. move to favor by petition)
properly, to mend (by stitching), i.e. (figuratively) to cure
properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
(by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
properly, to miss; hence (figuratively and generally) to sin; by inference, to forfeit, lack, expiate, repent, (causatively) lead astray, condemn

5.brief: bad or (as noun) evil (natural or moral)
properly, extent (of time); but used only adverbially (especially with other particle prefixes), when (either relative or interrogative)
to die (literally or figuratively); causatively, to kill
properly, to wander away, i.e. lose oneself; by implication to perish (causative, destroy)
an appellation, as amark or memorial of individuality; by implication honor, authority, character

6.brief: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
to go or come (in a wide variety of applications)
to see, literally or figuratively (in numerous applications, direct and implied, transitive, intransitive and causative)
evil (as destructive), literally (ruin) or morally (especially guile); figuratively idolatry (as false, subjective), uselessness (as deceptive, objective; also adverbially, in vain)
perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue
the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
strictly nothingness; also trouble. vanity, wickedness; specifically an idol
to go (causatively, bring) out, in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively, direct and proxim.
properly, separate by awall, i.e. outside, outdoors
perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue

7.brief: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
to whisper; by implication, to mumble aspell (as a magician)
properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute
bad or (as noun) evil (natural or moral)

8.brief: a word; by implication, a matter (as spoken of) or thing; adverbially, a cause
without profit, worthlessness; by extension, destruction, wickedness
properly, to pour out (transitive or intransitive); by implication, to melt or cast as metal; by extension, to place firmly, to stiffen or grow hard
who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
to lie down (for rest, sexual connection, decease or any other purpose)
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
to add or augment (often adverbial, to continue to do a thing)
to rise (in various applications, literal, figurative, intensive and causative)

9.brief: properly, assemblage; used only adverbially also, even, yea, though; often repeated as correl. both...and
a man as an individual or a male person; often used as an adjunct to a more definite term (and in such cases frequently not expressed in translation)
safe, i.e. (figuratively) well, happy, friendly; also (abstractly) welfare, i.e. health, prosperity, peace
who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
figuratively, to trust, be confident or sure
food (for man or beast), especially bread, or grain (for making it)
to be (causatively make) large (in various senses, as in body, mind, estate or honor, also in pride)
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
a heel (as protuberant); hence, a track; figuratively, the rear (of an army)

10.brief: thou and thee, or (plural) ye and you
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
properly, to bend or stoop in kindness to an inferior; to favor, bestow; causatively to implore (i.e. move to favor by petition)
to rise (in various applications, literal, figurative, intensive and causative)
to be safe (in mind, body or estate); figuratively, to be (causatively, make) completed; by implication, to be friendly; by extension, to reciprocate (in various applications)

11.brief: to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
(by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
properly, to incline to; by implication (literally but rarely) to bend; figuratively, to be pleased with, desire
(by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
to mar (especially by breaking); figuratively, to split the ears (with sound), i.e. shout (for alarm or joy)
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

12.brief: to sustain; by implication, to obtain, keep fast; figuratively, to help, follow close
to station, in various applications (literally or figuratively)
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
properly, concealed, i.e. the vanishing point; generally, time out of mind (past or future), i.e. (practically) eternity; frequentatively, adverbial (especially with prepositional prefix) always

13.brief: to kneel; by implication to bless God (as an act of adoration), and (vice-versa) man (as a benefit); also (by euphemism) to curse (God or the king, as treason)
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God

gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
Jisrael, a symbolical name of Jacob; also (typically) of his posterity
properly, concealed, i.e. the vanishing point; generally, time out of mind (past or future), i.e. (practically) eternity; frequentatively, adverbial (especially with prepositional prefix) always
as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
